item.title: Earning Beats app
item.description: I am a part time graduate student at Upenn MCIT program. In this summer, I took CIT591 - Introduction to Software Development course in which we created a Java based app as final team project. We built a tool that is designed to compare public companies reported earnings and consensus estimate and present a direct visualization to user. Users of our tool can utilize the data points analysis to make investment decisions.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: “Hello World” My blog is officially launched. This is the first time I built a website from stretch. I didn’t think much when I decided not to use a blog builder. For one, I don’t want to pay the fee. For two, WordPress is blocked by the GFW. The level of difficulty was unexpected. It took me a whole week to get it up there. I’m having a two week

About me Hi, Welcome to my blog. Initially, I wanted to create a blog to display my projects. After I spent so much time learning how to build a site using Github pages and Hugo, I think I am obligated to myself to keep writing posts. My avatar is an illustration from YAOYAO MA VAN. I love her painting. My blog template is Clear White created by Zhaohua Bing. Thanks a lot.
